page.title: 12EMPLOYMENT 1
page.content: BARNTON AND LITTLE LEIGH 03600375 EMPLOYMENT 1:A representative survey in Barnton showed that 60% are in full time employment,30% are in part-time employment and 10% are unwaged.The two main employers are ICI (Ref.03600375B) at 35% and local authorities at 20%. 5%are self-employed and the residue are employed singly by various private firms.The largest group of workers is white collar workers made up of clerical, professional and managerial staff in that order.Manual workers make up 25% of the sample.Only 10% of our sample work within the village, 40% in the neighbouring town of Northwich, 10% in Runcorn and the rest within a 25 mile radius of the village 80% travel to work by car involving only rarely the co-operative use of private vehicles.Remaining 20% walk or occasionally use public transport.
